    Oil Soluble Flavors

    We formulate these oil soluble flavors specifically for use in CBD tinctures, edibles and other applications requiring high impact oil soluble flavors. They are compatible with most fixed oils including fractionated coconut oil (MCT or medium chain triglycerides). We can also custom formulate flavors to meet specific strength, solubility, masking and other criteria.

    Featured Product

    Pina Colada Type, Natural Flavor Blend (Oil Soluble)

    Pina Colada Type, Natural Flavor Blend (Oil Soluble) was developed was developed for use in candies and confectionery and other products requiring oil soluble flavors. We recommend a starting use level of 0.25% to 0.50%.

Our Mission

Our mission is to be the supplier of choice to small and medium-sized food and beverage companies. No matter the size of your order, you will receive the same courteous customer service and prompt shipment. We process and ship 90.00% of our orders within 48 hours of their being placed. Home brewers, bakers, cake decorators, and other hobbyists have discovered that using our flavors, which are formulated for professionals, can help bring out the very best in their projects. We offer all of our products in small sizes to make them more accessible to the hobbyist.

The Apex product line includes citrus, berry, spice and herb, nut, orchard fruit, floral, tropical, melon, savory, and sweet flavors as well as vanilla and tea extracts, natural antioxidants and essential oils.

Our products are not sold for use in e-cigarettes or other similar electronic smoking devices. We do not supply e-liquid manufacturers or home hobbyists making e-liquids.

Rum Jamaican Dark Type

Rum Jamaican Dark Type, Natural flavor blend was developed as a match for the most popular brand of dark rum from Jamaica. This flavor is approximately 5 times stronger than the actual rum. It can be used in a wide range of alcoholic beverages including beer, cider, hard seltzer, RTD cocktails to impart a premium dark rum flavor.

Rum Barbados Gold

Rum Barbados Gold Type, Natural flavor blend was developed as a match for the most popular brand of gold rum from Barbados. This flavor is approximately 5 times stronger than the actual rum. It can be used in a wide range of alcoholic beverages including beer, cider, hard seltzer, RTD cocktails to impart Premium rom flavor.

Lemon Juice Type Extract, Natural

Lemon Juice Type Extract, Natural was developed for use in a wide range of alcoholic beverages including beer, cider, seltzer, spirits and wine that require a flavor reminiscent of fresh squeezed. Lemon juice. In most applications we recommend a starting use level of 0.10% to 0.30% and adjust to desired impact is achieved. In high proof spirits start at 0.75%. This flavor is TTB approved.

Banana Cream Pie

Banana Cream Pie Extract, Natural & Artificial can be used in a wide range of alcoholic beverages including beer, cider, wine and high proof spirits. We recommend a starting use level of 0.20% in beer and cider. In high proof spirits start at 0.50% and adjust to desired impact is achieved. This flavor is TTB approved.

Red Tropical Fruit Punch

Red Tropical Fruit Punch Type, Natural Flavor Blend is a blend of orange, passion fruit pineapple and other tropical fruit flavors. This flavor can be used in a wide range of alcoholic beverages including hard or spiked seltzer, beer, cider and high proof spirits. This flavor is TTB aboroved.

Bellini

Bellini Type, Natural Flavor blend was developed for use in hard or spiked seltzer. This popular cocktail is a blend of peach puree and prosecco. In most alcoholic beverages, we recommend a starting use level of 0.20% and adjust to desired impact is achieved. In high proof spirits start at 0.75%. This flavor is TTB approved.

Dill Pickle

Dill Pickle Type Flavor, Natural was developed for use in alcoholic beverages including beer, cider, hard seltzer and high proof spirits. In most applications we recommend a starting use level of 0.20% and adiust to desired impact is achieved. In high proof spirits start at 0.50%. This extract is TTB approved.

Citrus Extract Punch

Citrus Extract Punch Type, Natural is a blend of orange, lemon, tangerine, grapefruit and lime extracts. It was developed for use in alcoholic beverages, including beer, cider, wine and hard seltzer. We recommend a starting use level of 0.20% in most applications and adjust to desired impact is achieved. This extract is TTB approved.

Wild Huckleberry Lemonade

Another new flavor for hard and spiked seltzer!
